channel.title: Examples on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service
channel.description: Recent content in Examples on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service

item.title: Example of Code - Workers List
item.description: Create a file main.go with this content: package main import ( "flag" "fmt" "os" "github.com/ovh/cds/sdk/cdsclient" ) var host, token, username string func init() { flag.StringVar(&host, "api", "http://localhost:8081", "CDS API URL, ex: http://localhost:8081") flag.StringVar(&token, "token", "", "CDS Token") flag.StringVar(&username, "username", "", "CDS Username") } func main() { flag.Parse() cfg := cdsclient.Config{ Host: host, Token: token, User: username, } client := cdsclient.New(cfg) workers, err := client.WorkerList() if err != nil { fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "Error while getting workers:%s", err) os.
